lyrics:
10 contributorssingle lyricsintro
aww yeah thats right
all you single people out there
this is for you
yeah ha mmm

verse 1
im not waiting around for a man to save me

dont depend on a guy to validate me no no
i dont need to be anyones baby
is that so hard to understand
no i dont need another half to make me whole

doesnt mean i will or wont
im free to make my mind up
you either got it or you dont

this is my current single status
my declaration of independence
theres no way im trading places
right now a stars in the ascendant
im single right now
thats how i wanna be
im single right now
thats how i wanna be right now
you might also likepostchorus

i like who i am

cant romance on demand
im gonna wait so im sorry if your misunderstood
thats right uh ohh yeah yeah
